title: Scepter
description: scepter topped by a head on a long notched neck of hexagonal section; egg-shaped face with raised scarification on forehead and temples; incised checkerboard coiffure with two carved horns located just above center; reddish brown with a glossy patina
creditline: Gift of Sara and David Lieberman in honor of Evan Maurer's 50th Birthday and Sara Lieberman's 20 years as a docent
